languages.text: {n}Адальберт переводит взгляд на вас и печально вздыхает.{/n} "Меня предупредили о вашем визите, {name}. И о его цели".

traits.locale_text: {n}Адальберт переводит взгляд на вас и печально вздыхает.{/n} "Меня предупредили о вашем визите, {name}. И о его цели".

languages.text: {n}Adalbert shifts his gaze to you and lets out a mournful sigh.{/n} "I was warned about your visit, {name}. As well as its purpose."
languages.original_text: {n}Адальберт переводит взгляд на вас и печально вздыхает.{/n} "Меня предупредили о вашем визите, {name}. И о его цели".

traits.locale_text: {n}Adalbert shifts his gaze to you and lets out a sad sigh.{/n} "I have been warned about your visit, {name}. As well as its purpose."

{n}Adalbert shifts his gaze to you and lets out a mournful sigh.{/n} "I was warned about your visit, {name}. As well as its purpose."

languages.text: {n}Adalbert richtet seinen Blick auf dich und seufzt bedauernd.{/n} "Ich wurde vor Eurem Besuch gewarnt, {name}. Und vor seinem Zweck."
languages.original_text: {n}Adalbert shifts his gaze to you and lets out a mournful sigh.{/n} "I was warned about your visit, {name}. As well as its purpose."

traits.locale_text: {n}Adalbert richtet seinen Blick auf dich und seufzt bedauernd.{/n} "Ich wurde vor Eurem Besuch gewarnt, {name}. Und vor seinem Zweck."

languages.text: {n}Adalbert desvía su mirada hacia ti y deja escapar un suspiro de pena.{/n} «Me han advertido de su llegada, {name}. Y de su propósito».
languages.original_text: {n}Adalbert shifts his gaze to you and lets out a mournful sigh.{/n} "I was warned about your visit, {name}. As well as its purpose."

traits.locale_text: {n}Adalbert desvía su mirada hacia ti y deja escapar un suspiro de pena.{/n} «Me han advertido de su llegada, {name}. Y de su propósito».

languages.text: {n}アダルバートはこちらに視線を移し、悲し気にため息を吐く。{/n}「あなたは来ることは警告されていた、{name}。その目的についても」
languages.original_text: {n}Adalbert shifts his gaze to you and lets out a mournful sigh.{/n} "I was warned about your visit, {name}. As well as its purpose."

traits.locale_text: {n}アダルバートはこちらに視線を移し、悲し気にため息を吐く。{/n}「あなたは来ることは警告されていた、{name}。その目的についても」

languages.text: {n}阿达伯特将目光转向了你，发出了哀伤的叹息。{/n}“早就有人警告过我你会来这里，{name}，也警告了你来这里的目的。”
languages.original_text: {n}Adalbert shifts his gaze to you and lets out a mournful sigh.{/n} "I was warned about your visit, {name}. As well as its purpose."

traits.locale_text: {n}阿达伯特将目光转向了你，发出了哀伤的叹息。{/n}“早就有人警告过我你会来这里，{name}，也警告了你来这里的目的。”

languages.text: {n}Adalbert tourne son regard vers vous et pousse un soupir dolent.{/n} « On m'a averti de votre visite, {name}. Je sais déjà ce qui vous amène. »
languages.original_text: {n}Adalbert shifts his gaze to you and lets out a mournful sigh.{/n} "I was warned about your visit, {name}. As well as its purpose."

traits.locale_text: {n}Adalbert tourne son regard vers vous et pousse un soupir dolent.{/n} « On m'a averti de votre visite, {name}. Je sais déjà ce qui vous amène. »

languages.text: {n}Adalbert bakışlarını sana çeviriyor ve matemli bir tavırla iç çekiyor.{/n} "Ziyaretin konusunda uyarılmıştım {name}. Niyetin konusunda da."
languages.original_text: {n}Adalbert shifts his gaze to you and lets out a mournful sigh.{/n} "I was warned about your visit, {name}. As well as its purpose."
